name: Tableau Web Data Connector
description: Enable Tableau (v10.0+) users to connect Tableau to a REDCap project for which they have an API token. Project data will be exported on demand and be available for use within Tableau to produce summaries and visualisations. (Note: The connector can be utilised without enabling this module for a particular project. Enabling this module for a project just makes the Instructions page available in the project page menu.)

system-settings.name: Instruction panel text
system-settings.default:
1. In Tableau, go to Connect -> To a Server -> More and find "Web Data Connector"
  2. Enter the url displayed above as the "web data connector URL" in the dialog and press Enter
  3. Enter your project API token
  4. Click "Submit", and your project data will be downloaded into Tableau

system-settings.name: Connector Page title
system-settings.default: Tableau Web Data Connector for REDCap

system-settings.name: Connector page instruction text
system-settings.default: Select the desired data format and enter your API token, then click "Submit".
